title: Set up release automation workflow
description: Create .github/workflows/release.yaml that triggers on version tags, runs GoReleaser, publishes to GitHub releases and Homebrew tap.

title: Implement AWS provider configuration
description: Create AWS-specific config struct with fields for sso_start_url, sso_region, credential_process_auto_login, steampipe settings. Add validation.

title: Create initial documentation structure
description: Set up docs/ directory with README.md, architecture/ folder, cli/ folder, and initial architecture/overview.md describing the system design.

title: Add list command for providers
description: Implement list command to show available providers, their status (enabled/disabled), and whether prerequisites are met.

title: Implement clean command
description: Create clean command to remove generated configs. Support provider-specific and 'all' cleanup. Confirm before deletion unless --force flag.

title: Set up CLI framework with Cobra
description: Initialize Cobra for CLI with verb-noun pattern. Implement root command with global flags (--config, --dry-run, --verbose, --no-backup). Add version command.

title: Implement AWS provider skeleton
description: Create aws provider implementing the Provider interface. Set up package structure in internal/providers/aws/. Stub all required methods.

title: Add Granted config generation
description: Port and improve existing Granted config generation. Support OS-specific templates (darwin/linux). Handle SSO configuration, credential process auto-login.

title: Build Docker multi-arch images
description: Create Dockerfile with multi-stage build. Configure GoReleaser for multi-arch images. Publish to ghcr.io/jmreicha/lazycfg.

title: Implement generate command structure
description: Create generate command that accepts provider names (aws, kubernetes, ssh, all). Wire up to core engine. Support dry-run mode.

title: Add prerequisite validation for AWS provider
description: Implement Validate() to check for granted and steampipe commands. Check AWS config file existence. Provide helpful error messages.

title: Implement backup and restore system
description: Build backup/restore functionality for config files. Create timestamped backups, support rollback on errors. Store backups in ~/.lazycfg/backups/ with metadata.

title: Implement provider registry
description: Create registry pattern to register and lookup providers. Support registration at init time and runtime queries. Include validation of provider names and conflicts.

title: Add self-update command
description: Implement update command that checks GitHub releases for newer versions, downloads, verifies, and replaces binary. Support for Homebrew-installed binaries.

title: Set up GoReleaser configuration
description: Create .goreleaser.yaml for multi-platform builds (linux/amd64, linux/arm64, darwin/amd64, darwin/arm64). Configure archives, checksums, SBOM generation.

title: Add shell completion generation
description: Implement completion command for bash, zsh, fish. Use Cobra's built-in completion support. Document installation in docs/cli/completions.md.

title: Phase 0: Core architecture and interfaces
description: Define and implement core provider interface, registry pattern, and engine orchestration. This is the foundation for the plugin-based architecture.

title: Design configuration model and loading system
description: Create Config struct and loading logic with precedence: CLI flags > cfg.yaml > defaults. Use viper for YAML loading. Support searching in ./cfg.yaml, ~/.config/lazycfg/cfg.yaml, ~/.lazycfg/cfg.yaml

title: Write comprehensive documentation
description: Complete all docs in docs/ directory: architecture guides, CLI reference, configuration reference, provider guides, installation guides, development guide.

title: Phase 1: AWS Provider implementation
description: Implement AWS provider with Granted and Steampipe config generation. First production provider showcasing the plugin architecture.

title: Phase 3: SSH Provider implementation
description: Implement SSH provider for SSH config management and known_hosts handling. Third provider completing initial feature set.

title: Update README with new architecture
description: Rewrite README.md to reflect new architecture, installation methods, quick start guide, and link to full documentation.

title: Create AWS provider documentation
description: Write docs/providers/aws.md with usage examples, configuration options, prerequisites, and troubleshooting.

title: Wire AWS provider to CLI
description: Register AWS provider in registry. Add AWS-specific flags to generate command. Update documentation for AWS provider usage.

title: Add structured logging with slog
description: Implement logging infrastructure using Go's slog. Support debug, info, warn, error levels. Wire verbose flag to debug level. Format for human readability.

title: Create AUR package
description: Create PKGBUILD for Arch User Repository. Set up automation to update on new releases. Document AUR installation.

title: Implement automated releases
description:
Generate automated releases based on conventional commits.

This should:

- Create a new release based on conventional commit messages
- Generate CHANGELOG and release notes automatically

title: Phase 2: Kubernetes Provider implementation
description: Implement K8s provider with kubeconfig parsing, merging, and EKS integration. Second major provider validating architecture.

title: Add Steampipe config generation
description: Port and improve Steampipe config generation. Create aggregator connection, support plugin list configuration.

title: Build core engine for provider orchestration
description: Implement engine that coordinates provider lifecycle: validation, backup, generation, error handling, rollback. Should support running single provider or all providers.

title: Design and document provider interface
description: Define the Provider interface with methods: Name(), Validate(), Generate(), Backup(), Restore(), Clean(). Document the contract and lifecycle in docs/architecture/providers.md

title: Create install script
description: Build curl | sh style install script that detects OS/arch, downloads appropriate binary, verifies checksum, installs to /usr/local/bin or ~/bin.

title: Write AWS provider tests
description: Add unit tests for AWS provider: config validation, template rendering, file generation. Add integration tests with fixtures. Test error cases.

title: Create Homebrew tap and formula
description: Set up jmreicha/homebrew-tap repository. Configure GoReleaser to publish formula. Test installation via brew.

title: Create tooling for running tasks using go-task
description:
Rather than maintaing bash scripts for various tasks we need to do, we want  handle them with go-task. This also allows for wrapping build commands instead of using Makefiles.

We need a few different tasks to start, with more later so keep that in mind.

- Bootstrap and set up dependencies, dependencies and tools
- Build the binary
- Running fmt, lints and tests

We also need to search and update all documentation to reference the go tasks that are created.

Grep all the md files for relevant info.

title: Write comprehensive tests for core components
description: Add unit tests for provider interface, registry, engine, config loading, and backup system. Use table-driven tests. Target >80% coverage for core package.
